name: Cat Goes Platform
description: You play as a cat, and you will regain the lost snacks from deadly cave.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp,Vista,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: any Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics, nVidia GeForce, AMD Radeon or any Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows xp,Vista,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Intel core i3 or any Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics, nVidia GeForce, AMD Radeon or any Storage: 500 MB available space
